dependencies.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: An ESLint plugin that covers TypeScript code. It must always match the version of `@typescript-eslint/parser`.
dependencies.@typescript-eslint/parser: An ESLint parser for TypeScript code. It must always match the version of `@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin`.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-eslint-comments: An ESLint plugin that covers the use of ESLint comments.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-functional: An ESLint plugin that encourages principles from the functional programming paradigm.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-redundant-undefined: An ESLint plugin that covers the redundant use of undefined in optional type declarations.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-unicorn: An ESLint plugin that complements the built-in set of rules.

devDependencies.@types/eslint: A set of type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependencies.vite-plugin-dts: A Vite plugin that generates TypeScript declaration files.

peerDependencies.eslint: A static program analysis tool that uncovers code issues.
peerDependencies.typescript: A statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
